articles.author: Ryan Leston
articles.title: 007 Director Calls Henry Cavill’s James Bond Audition ‘Tremendous’ - IGN
articles.description: Henry Cavill’s 007 audition was "tremendous” according to Casino Royale director Martin Campbell.
articles.content:
Henry Cavills 007 audition was tremendous according to Casino Royale director, Martin Campbell.
During an interview with The Express, the filmmaker revealed new details about Cavills 007 screen test… [+2719 chars]
